sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Sarra FreyÂ is one of SerÂ Raymund Frey'sÂ fourteen-year-old twin daughters.Â She is pimply. Sarra was one of the Frey women presented to Robb StarkÂ when he came to the TwinsÂ for Lord Edmure Tully's wedding.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Sarra is one of the many granddaughters of [[Walder Frey]], the [[Lord of the Crossing]].
===[[Season 3]]===
Along with several of Lord Frey's other daughters and granddaughters, [[Robb Stark]] had the option of marrying her. When he arrives at [[The Twins]] for his uncle [[Edmure Tully|Edmure]]'sÂ [[Red Wedding|wedding]], Robb apologizesÂ for his slight against them. Lord Walder states that Robb could have had either Sarra or her twin sister [[Serra Frey|Serra]], or he could have had both for all he cared.<ref>"[[The Rains of Castamere (episode)|The Rains of Castamere]]"</ref>
